comment: I don t think its possible superNT to get chip support , its jailbreak just loads the rom into memory , there is no cart access , I guess maybe with a major modification to the firmware but its not as simple as just porting it from sd2snes
amr:

      :op1 (t / think-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (p / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (g / get-01
                        :ARG0 (s / superNT)
                        :ARG1 (s2 / support-01
                              :ARG0 (c / chip)
                              :ARG1 s))))
      :op2 (l / load-01
            :ARG0 (b / break-02
                  :ARG1 (j / jail))
            :ARG1 (r / rom)
            :ARG2 (m / memory)
            :mod (j2 / just))
      :op3 (a2 / access-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (c2 / cart))
      :op4 (g2 / guess-01
            :ARG0 ii
            :ARG1 (p2 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (m2 / modify-01
                        :ARG1 (f / firmware)
                        :ARG1-of (m3 / major-02))
                  :ARG1-of m3))
      :concession-of (s3 / simple-02
            :ARG1 g
            :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 g
                  :ARG3 (e / equal)
                  :ARG4 (p3 / port-02
                        :ARG1 g
                        :ARG2 (p4 / product
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "SD2snes"))
                        :mod (j3 / just)))))
